original_text: To turn aside the needy from judgment, and to take away the right from the poor of my people, that widows may be their prey, and that they may rob the fatherless!
korean_text: 가난한 자를 불공평하게 판결하여 가난한 내 백성의 권리를 박탈하며 과부에게 토색하고 고아의 것을 약탈하는 자는 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: To turn aside the needy from judgment
and to take away the right
from the poor of my people
that widows may be their prey
and that they may rob the fatherless
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 아버지 없는 자를 약탈하게 하려고
